languages.text: "А, в пекло! Я — сержант Малгар, вы поступаете под мою команду. Живо оправились и маршем за мной, я вам сектор обороны нарежу". {n}К концу тирады голос сержанта становится тише, а взгляд его упирается в вашу дорогую экипировку.{/n}

"Pah, by all the saints! I'm Sergeant Malgar, and you lot report to me now. Straighten yourselves out and drag your arses after me, I'll map out a defence sector for you." {n}By the end of his tirade, the sergeant's voice grows quieter as his eyes focus on your expensive gear.{/n}
languages.original_text: "А, в пекло! Я — сержант Малгар, вы поступаете под мою команду. Живо оправились и маршем за мной, я вам сектор обороны нарежу". {n}К концу тирады голос сержанта становится тише, а взгляд его упирается в вашу дорогую экипировку.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ah, screw it! I am Sergeant Malgar, and you lot report to me now. Straighten yourselves out and drag your carcasses after me, I'll map out a defence sector for you." {n}By the end of his tirade, the sergeant's voice grows quieter as his eyes focus on your expensive gear.{/n}

"Ah, screw it! I am Sergeant Malgar, and you lot report to me now. Straighten yourselves out and drag your carcasses after me, I'll map out a defence sector for you." {n}By the end of his tirade, the sergeant's voice grows quieter as his eyes focus on your expensive gear.{/n}

"Pah, by all the hells! I'm Sergeant Malgar, and you lot report to me now. Straighten yourselves out and drag your arses after me, I'll map out a defence sector for you." {n}By the end of his tirade, the sergeant's voice grows quieter as his eyes focus on your expensive gear.{/n}

"Pah, by all the hells! I'm Sergeant Malgar, and you lot report to me now. Straighten yourselves out and drag your arses after me, I'll map out a defence sector for you." {n}By the end of his tirade, the sergeant's voice grows quieter as his eyes focus on your expensive gear.{/n}

"Pah, by all the hells! I'm Sergeant Malgar, and you lot report to me now. Straighten yourselves out and drag your arses after me, I'll map out a defence sector for you." {n}By the end of his tirade, the sergeant's voice grows quieter as his eyes focus on your expensive gear.{/n}

"Pah, by all the hells! I'm Sergeant Malgar, and you lot report to me now. Straighten yourselves out and drag your arses after me, I'll map out a defence sector for you." {n}By the end of his tirade, the sergeant's voice grows quieter as his eyes focus on your expensive gear.{/n}

languages.text: "Pah, bei allen Heiligen! Ich bin Sergeant Malgar, und Ihr untersteht jetzt alle mir. Reißt Euch am Riemen und schwingt Eure faulen Ärsche, ich weise Euch einen Verteidigungssektor zu." {n}Gegen Ende seiner Tirade wird die Stimme des Sergeants leiser, als sein Blick an deiner teuren Ausrüstung hängenbleibt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Pah, by all the saints! I'm Sergeant Malgar, and you lot report to me now. Straighten yourselves out and drag your arses after me, I'll map out a defence sector for you." {n}By the end of his tirade, the sergeant's voice grows quieter as his eyes focus on your expensive gear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Pah, bei allen Höllen! Ich bin Sergeant Malgar, und Ihr Pack untersteht jetzt mir. Reißt Euch am Riemen und schwingt Eure faulen Ärsche, ich weise Euch einen Verteidigungssektor zu." {n}Gegen Ende seiner Tirade wird die Stimme des Sergeants leiser, als sein Blick an deiner teuren Ausrüstung hängenbleibt.{/n}

languages.text: « Par tous les saints... Je suis le sergent Malgar et maintenant, c'est à moi que vous obéissez, vu ? Rectifiez la position et ramenez vos fesses, je vais vous attribuer un secteur de défense. » {n}La voix du sergent perd de sa superbe à mesure que ses yeux examinent votre équipement hors de prix.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Pah, by all the saints! I'm Sergeant Malgar, and you lot report to me now. Straighten yourselves out and drag your arses after me, I'll map out a defence sector for you." {n}By the end of his tirade, the sergeant's voice grows quieter as his eyes focus on your expensive gear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Par l'enfer... Je suis le sergent Malgar et maintenant, c'est à moi que vous obéissez, vu ? Rectifiez la position et ramenez vos fesses, je vais vous attribuer un secteur de défense. » {n}La voix du sergent perd de sa superbe à mesure que ses yeux examinent votre équipement.{/n}

languages.text: “呸，都见鬼去吧！我是马尔加军士，你们现在立刻向我报告。站直身子，紧紧跟在我后面，我要给你们规划一片防御区域。”{n}说完这一通长篇大论后，他突然住了口，目光紧紧地盯着你的昂贵装备。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Pah, by all the saints! I'm Sergeant Malgar, and you lot report to me now. Straighten yourselves out and drag your arses after me, I'll map out a defence sector for you." {n}By the end of his tirade, the sergeant's voice grows quieter as his eyes focus on your expensive gear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “呸，都见鬼去吧！我是马尔加军士，你们现在立刻向我报告。站直身子，紧紧跟在我后面，我要给你们规划一片防御区域。”{n}说完这一通长篇大论后，他突然住了口，目光紧紧地盯着你的昂贵装备。{/n}

languages.text: 「ハッ、どこもかしこも！俺はマルガー軍曹、貴様達、今から俺の指揮下だ。防衛区域割り当ててやるから、そのケツを引きずって俺の後についてこい」{n}激しい命令の最後には軍曹の声も小さくなり、男の視線はこちらの高価な装備に釘付けになっていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Pah, by all the saints! I'm Sergeant Malgar, and you lot report to me now. Straighten yourselves out and drag your arses after me, I'll map out a defence sector for you." {n}By the end of his tirade, the sergeant's voice grows quieter as his eyes focus on your expensive gear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ハッ、どこもかしこも地獄だ！俺はマルガー軍曹、貴様達、今すぐ報告しろ。防衛区域の地図を作るから、そのケツを引きずって俺の後についてこい」{n}激しい命令の最後には軍曹の声も小さくなり、男の視線はこちらの高価な装備に釘付けになっていた。{/n}

languages.text: «¡Bah, por todos los santos! Soy el Sargento Malgar, y desde este momento estoy al mando de estos mendrugos. Enderezaos y seguidme, prepararé un sector de defensa». {n}Al final de su discurso, la voz del sargento se vuelve más tranquila mientras sus ojos se centran en tu caro equipamiento.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Pah, by all the saints! I'm Sergeant Malgar, and you lot report to me now. Straighten yourselves out and drag your arses after me, I'll map out a defence sector for you." {n}By the end of his tirade, the sergeant's voice grows quieter as his eyes focus on your expensive gear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Bah, por todos los infiernos! Soy el Sargento Malgar, y desde este momento estoy al mando de estos mendrugos. Enderazaos y seguidme, prepararé un sector de defensa». {n}Al final de su discurso, la voz del sargento se vuelve más tranquila mientras sus ojos se centran en tu caro equipamiento.{/n}

languages.text: "Neyse, kimse kim! Ben Çavuş Malgar, artık bana hesap vereceksiniz. Donunuzu götünüze çekip düşün peşime, size bir savunma sektörü ayarlayayım." {n}Zılgıt çeken çavuşun sesi, pahalı teçhizatını fark etmesiyle beraber kısılıveriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Pah, by all the saints! I'm Sergeant Malgar, and you lot report to me now. Straighten yourselves out and drag your arses after me, I'll map out a defence sector for you." {n}By the end of his tirade, the sergeant's voice grows quieter as his eyes focus on your expensive gear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Neyse, kimse kim! Ben Çavuş Malgar, artık bana hesap vereceksiniz. Donunuzu götünüze çekip düşün peşime, size bir savunma sektörü ayarlayayım." {n}Zılgıt çeken çavuşun sesi, pahalı teçhizatını fark etmesiyle beraber kısılıveriyor.{/n}
